about.section_subtitle: Your reliable partner on the road to recovery
about.description: SEMIMED Rehabilitation Center combines modern technology with an individual approach. Our team of experienced professionals will help you return to a full and active life.
about.description2: We use state-of-the-art equipment and evidence-based rehabilitation techniques to ensure the most effective recovery for every patient.
about.page_subtitle: Learn more about our mission, team, and approach to rehabilitation
about.history_p1: SEMIMED Rehabilitation Center was founded with the goal of providing quality rehabilitation care to residents of our city and region. From the very beginning, we set ourselves an ambitious goal — to create a center that combines the best global rehabilitation practices with an individual approach.
about.history_p2: Today, SEMIMED is a modern rehabilitation center equipped with state-of-the-art equipment, where a team of highly qualified specialists with many years of experience works.
about.mission_text: To help every patient return to a full and active life using the most modern rehabilitation methods and an individual approach.

individual.title: Individual Approach
individual.text: Each patient receives a personal rehabilitation program designed with their condition, needs, and goals in mind.

evidence.title: Evidence-Based Medicine
evidence.text: We use only techniques whose effectiveness has been confirmed by scientific research and clinical practice.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Care
comprehensive.text: Combining different rehabilitation methods allows us to achieve maximum results in the shortest time.

modern.title: Modern Equipment
modern.text: Our center is equipped with state-of-the-art rehabilitation equipment from leading global manufacturers.

about.team_subtitle: Experienced specialists who care about your health

member1.name: Olena Semenova
member1.bio: Over 15 years of experience in rehabilitation medicine. Specialization — recovery after musculoskeletal injuries.

member2.name: Andriy Kovalenko
member2.bio: Certified physiotherapist with 10 years of experience. Specialization — sports rehabilitation and kinesiotherapy.

member3.name: Maria Petrenko
member3.bio: Qualified therapeutic massage specialist. Over 8 years of experience at leading clinics.

member4.name: Igor Shevchenko
member4.bio: Specialist in kinesiotherapy and functional training. Specialization — spine rehabilitation.

member5.name: Natalia Bondarenko
member5.bio: Experienced neurologist with 12 years of practice. Specialization — rehabilitation after strokes and neurological diseases.

member6.name: Oleksandr Melnyk
member6.bio: Specialist in hardware rehabilitation methods. Certified in the use of modern physiotherapy equipment.

testimonials.section_subtitle: What our patients say about their rehabilitation experience at SEMIMED

t1.text: After a knee injury, I thought I would never run again. Thanks to the SEMIMED team, I returned to training in 3 months. Incredibly grateful!
t1.name: Oleksiy T.

t2.text: Professional approach and attentive attitude to every patient. Therapeutic massage and physiotherapy helped me get rid of chronic back pain.
t2.name: Iryna K.

t3.text: SEMIMED Center is a place where they truly help. After shoulder surgery, I completed a full rehabilitation course and fully restored mobility.
t3.name: Vasyl M.

t4.text: Very satisfied with the results of kinesiotherapy. SEMIMED specialists developed an individual program for me that gave wonderful results.
t4.name: Tetiana L.

t5.text: I recommend SEMIMED to everyone who needs quality rehabilitation. Modern equipment, experienced doctors, and a warm human approach.
t5.name: Mykhailo S.

services_page.page_subtitle: Full range of rehabilitation services for your recovery

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.description: Physiotherapy is the foundation of the rehabilitation process that helps restore motor functions, reduce pain, and improve quality of life. Our physiotherapists use an individual approach to every patient.

massage.title: Therapeutic Massage
massage.description: Professional therapeutic massage helps relieve muscle tension, improve blood circulation, and accelerate the recovery process. Our massage therapists have years of experience working with patients of all ages.

kinesio.title: Kinesiotherapy
kinesio.description: Kinesiotherapy — treatment through movement. This is a rehabilitation method that uses specially selected physical exercises to restore body functions after injuries, surgeries, and diseases.

electro.title: Electrotherapy
electro.description: Electrotherapy uses electrical impulses of different frequencies and intensities for pain treatment, muscle stimulation, and acceleration of tissue recovery processes.

spine.title: Spine Rehabilitation
spine.description: Comprehensive spine rehabilitation program includes diagnostics, treatment, and prevention of musculoskeletal disorders using modern methods and equipment.

sport.title: Sports Rehabilitation
sport.description: Sports rehabilitation is aimed at the quick and safe return of athletes to training and competition after injuries. We work with athletes at all levels of preparation.

services_page.methods_subtitle: We use a comprehensive approach and modern techniques for effective recovery

neurorehab.title: Neurorehabilitation
neurorehab.desc: Recovery after strokes, traumatic brain injuries, and neurological disorders.

trauma.title: Trauma Rehabilitation
trauma.desc: Comprehensive recovery after fractures, sprains, and surgical interventions.

spine.desc: Treatment and prevention of spinal and musculoskeletal disorders.

massage.title: Therapeutic Massage
massage.desc: Relieving muscle tension, improving blood circulation, and accelerating recovery.

mechano.title: Mechanotherapy
mechano.desc: Recovery using specialized exercise machines and mechanical devices.

evminov.title: Evminov Trainer
evminov.desc: Spinal traction and back muscle strengthening on a specialized trainer.

lfk.title: Therapeutic Exercise (LFK)
lfk.desc: Physical therapy exercises for body strengthening and disease prevention.

kinesio.title: Kinesiotherapy
kinesio.desc: Treatment through movement — individual exercise programs for functional recovery.

manual.title: Manual Therapy
manual.desc: Hands-on techniques for restoring joint mobility and releasing muscle blocks.

pir.title: Post-Isometric Relaxation (PIR)
pir.desc: Gentle muscle stretching to eliminate spasms and restore mobility.

services_page.conditions_subtitle: We help patients with various diagnoses and conditions
services_page.cta_text: Contact us for a free consultation and selection of the optimal rehabilitation program.
